mapper.select: SELECT rownum, n.* FROM notice n order by rownum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( notice_no, ref_member_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_count ) values( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{refMemberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, default, 0 )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_date = default where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
